#1. Load the Libraries
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("janitor")
bison_data <- read.csv("data/bison.csv")
```

#2.
```{r}
dim(bison_data)
```

```{r}
str(bison_data)
```
#3.
```{r}
bison_limited <- select(bison_data, data_code, animal_sex, animal_weight, animal_yob)
```

#4.
```{r}
animallimited <- bison_limited%>%
  filter(between(animal_yob, 1980, 1990))%>%
  arrange(animal_yob)
```

#5. How many males and females? F=414 M=21
```{r}
  table(animallimited$animal_sex)
```

#6. Between 1980-1990, male were on average heavier than females
```{r}
femalelimited <- filter(animallimited, animal_sex == "F")
```

```{r}
malelimited <- filter(animallimited, animal_sex == "M")
```

```{r}
isLarge = mean(malelimited$animal_weight) > mean(femalelimited$animal_weight)
```
